wikipedia_page.main: Simon Wilkinson (born Simon John Wilkinson, 2 February 1972, Worthing, Sussex) is a British ambient musician and composer mainly working in the fields of music for film, television and documentary. He also works under the production name 'The Blue Mask' or 'Thebluemask'.

link_mentions.page: United Kingdom in the Eurovision Song Contest 1996

response: * Simon Wilkinson, musician, was born in Worthing in 1972
* The Blue Mask, or Thebluemask, the production name of Simon Wilkinson (composer)
* Simon Wilkinson (composer) (born 1972), British musician and composer
* Simon Wilkinson (transmedia artist), British transmedia artist
